project.description: 获取所有社区存在匿名用户的OBS，获取OBS下所有可能敏感文件； 存放位置：openeuler账号 obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/all-obs-info/； 当前使用zhaochunjiang账号AKSK;若账号失效后，请使用新账号AKSK替换当前AKSK；

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo `id` date_str=`date +%Y%m%d` if ! hash obsutil 2>/dev/null;then wget https://obs-community.obs.cn-north-1.myhuaweicloud.com/obsutil/current/obsutil_linux_amd64.tar.gz tar -xzvf obsutil_linux_amd64.tar.gz && chmod 755 ./obsutil_linux_amd64_5.3.4/obsutil && mv ./obsutil_linux_amd64_5.3.4/obsutil /usr/bin/obsutil rm -rf ./obsutil* fi
# get python file temp=`pip list |grep -i esdk-obs-python` if [[ -z $temp ]]; then pip3 install esdk-obs-python --trusted-host pypi.org fi
while : do if [ ! -e scan_obs.py ];then wget https://github.com/Open-Infra-Ops/huaweicloud-tools/blob/main/scan_obs/scan_obs.py else break fi done
# download AKSK file from OBS bucket obsutil cp obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/secret-files/collect_elastic_public_ip.yaml ./scan_obs.yaml -i=${AK} -k=${SK} -e=${EP} ls ./ -al
# build python3 scan_obs.py mv scan_obs_anonymous_bucket.txt scan_obs_anonymous_bucket_${date_str}.txt mv scan_obs_sensitive_file.txt scan_obs_sensitive_file_${date_str}.txt
# upload txt files to OBS bucket obsutil cp ./scan_obs_anonymous_bucket_${date_str}.txt obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/all-obs-info/scan_obs_anonymous_bucket_${date_str}.txt -i=${AK} -k=${SK} -e=${EP} obsutil cp ./scan_obs_sensitive_file_${date_str}.txt obs://obs-for-openeuler-developer/all-obs-info/scan_obs_sensitive_file_${date_str}.txt -i=${AK} -k=${SK} -e=${EP}
